reference.shortdesc: The fallback element provides content to be presented when multimedia objects cannot be rendered.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: The contents of this element should be displayed only when the media that is referenced by the containing object element cannot be displayed.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: .

example.title: Example
example.p: See object for examples of this element.
